source.1a8c55fb:
#Cases of Property Stolen across the year of all the States 
sortbyyear=property1.groupby(['Year'],as_index=False).sum()
sortbyyear
plt.figure(figsize = (20, 10))
chart=sns.barplot(x=sortbyyear.Year,y=sortbyyear.Cases_Property_Stolen)
chart.set_xticklabels(chart.get_xticklabels(), rotation=45)
chart

chart=sns.barplot(x=sortbyyear.Year,y=sortbyyear.Value_of_Property_Stolen)
chart.set_xticklabels(chart.get_xticklabels(), rotation=45)
chart

source.35d669c3:
From the numbers we can understand that 21(Manipur) has the lowest recovery rate ,first row (5.66)
Second is Bihar with 15.50 % rate followed by Jharkhand in the third place with 19.99 % recovery rate
While with a RR of 79.22 ,(30)Tamil Nadu Police works most effeciently and productively followed by Mizoram(23) with 70.26 ,Punjab(27) with 56.57 % ,while Andhra Pradesh and Puducherry at 51% RR. 

The mean recovery rates of all the states on recovery based on cases is 34.81 %
